title: ERROR: Mail server outlook.office365.com responded: Server Unavailable. 21
content: Hello. I have been asked by Microsoft Support to contact Thunderbird to resolve a recurrent error in the POP connection. At unpredictable times, Thunderbird stops downloading messages with error message Server Unavailable 21. Microsoft finds their systems run properly and they think it is a Thunderbird problem. The error is also described on Reddit by other users.
creator: norman.schuerhoff

title: Mozilla Thunderbird constantly crashing
content: I have been using Mozilla Thunderbird for years and have been satisfied over those years, however, in the last few years the email crashes regularly, it sometime shows a message in my email when none exits, I am not hugely tech savy, I know enough to get by, can you help?

title: New Window
content: I had to reinstall Win 10 and obviously Tbird after that. Without knowing about it the latest version differs in some ways to the 'old'. I now face a problem with the display. The upper part of the window lists all the mails as usual and the open mail in the screen section below that. Only problem is that i cannot reduce the number of messages displayed in the upper screen section so have 7 instead of the previous 4 messages. Al in all this has reduced the visibility of the actual mail being read considerably. Try as i might i cannot find out how to be able to modify. Previously one could expand or reduce the size of the upper screen section. Can anyone please teach me how to adjust the screen? Thank you john ccombes
creator: johnc48

title: Emails supposedly downloaded but not in Inbox
content: TB worked fine until a couple of days ago, when suddenly I got: Error with accounts x and x, wait until they are processed. Then at the bottom of the screen it said: Downloading xx emails, but nothing went to the Inbox. These are my attempts after googling the issue: - I tried deleting the .msf files from the Profile, that failed. - I deleted the Local Folders an replaced it with the last working one from Time machine, that failed. - I have deleted the Inbox and Inbox.msf (after moving the contents in a temp. sub folder), but so far there is nothing in the new Inbox. - I deleted the Profile and replaced it with the last working one from Time Machine (16.8.23). The Inbox was repopulated but the missing emails are still missing, and also the ones which should have downloaded from the webmail I have used since. I have a Macbook Air M2 (Ventura 13.5), and TB is up to date (v. 115.1.1.) Thank you.
creator: gfinley

title: Can't see Trash folder ... none of suggestions I've found work
content:
I cannot see the Trash folder in one of my imap accounts. I have tried all the tips and suggestions I have been able to find using google searches, but none of them allow me to see the Trash folder.

I can see the Trash folder when I access the account with Firefox. The account runs on Google mail but appears as an account at my university. I also have a straight google mail account and I can see the trash folder in that account--in that account Trash and other folders (e.g., spam,sent) appear as subfolders of [Gmail]. This means I'm able to recover items in the Trash folder only by logging into the account using Firefox.

Any suggestions would be helpful.
creator: BertKritzer

title: Problema con risoluzione video
content:
Buongiorno, per lavoro uso un Dell Latitude 7340 e duplico l'immagine su un monitor Philips 243V7Q. Per uso personale ho installato anche Thunderbird 102.14.0 (32 bit), con cui mi trovo benissimo da anni, ma..... mentre la risoluzione sul video del PC è PERFETTA, quella del Philips è tutta sgranata. Anche cambiando la risoluzione del Philips non risolvo il problema. Se faccio un "cattura schermo" noterete, come potrete vedere dal file che allego, che l'immagine catturata viene perfetta ! Ma...... facendo una foto col cellulare (vedi file allegato) potete vedere come IO vedo nella realtà il programma. Nota: questo problema ce l'ho solo con Thunderbird.

Potete aiutarmi ?

Grazie mille per l'attenzione.

Mario S.
creator: mario.scaburri

title: Problemi con Thunderbird Supernova
content: Buongiorno, vorrei segnalare il continuo disfunzionamento del vostro e-mail client Thunderbird Sypernova 115.1.1 (64bit). Utilizzo il vostro client mail thunderbird da tantissimo tempo nelle altre verisioni e sempre su windows anche in versioni precedenti, e non ho mai avuto problemi. Recentemente ho voluto installare questa Vs. nuova versione, sul mio PC con Windows 11 ma ho riscontrato frequenti crash. Inoltre mentre lo si utilizza spesso si blocca e si mette in una fase di "NON RISPONDE" non acctta più alcun comando e devo pertanto riavviare il PC. Potreste dirmi se questa versione presenta dei problemi? in tal caso ritorno alla versione cprecedente che funzionava benissimo. Grazie Matteo Assi

title: Compacting email
content:
Occasionally upon opening my Thunderbird email program I get the message that Thunderbird needs to compact messages, but when I try to do so I always get a error message that the messages can't be compacted because another program is operating, even though I don't have another program running. So I don't know how to fix the problem. Since installing Thunderbird I don't believe the email has ever been compacted.

Thanks for your help. Nancy
creator: desertwinds06

title: Messages reappear in inbox after they are moved or deleted
content:
I have had an IMAP account from Zoho configured in Thunderbird for many years.

Starting several months ago (I don't remember exactly) when I move or delete messages from my inbox, they disappear for a few seconds, then reappear in my inbox. Then after a while (sometimes a few minutes, sometimes much longer) they eventually disappear again and do not come back. It's like the command is failing and retrying, or sync is overlapping with delete, or ???

This is happening on two computers, one with a brand new Thunderbird installation.

I searched and found people with similar problems and tried the solutions offered of emptying folders and compacting the inbox, trash, junk, etc. - it has not helped.
creator: vixeny

title: Thunderbird and Deleting Messages
content: Thunderbird: Deleting a message in the Inbox does NOT delete the message anywhere else including "All Mail". I want a deletion, whether in the Inbox or AllMail,' that will also delete the message everywhere else that message is held.

title: Keep the unread state without get notified
content:
Hi everybody :)

I subscribed to certain mailing list and I get all the thread replies notifications and sometimes it is annoying and it disturbs me but for as much I wish to be able to consult later all the threads which I did not read.

So with filter rules I want to find a way to move an incoming email in a given folder in keeping the unread state but without get notified. So later, in this folder I will see which are the unread threads without having been disturbed in any way when they arrived.

I have not found a way to achieve this.

An idea ?

Thank you in advance. With adelphity estebann

title: New message filter for existing sub-folder causes disappearing messages
content:
TB 102.14.0 Windows 10 Pro

I use Global Inbox (Local Folders) for several email addresses. From "local folder" I created many more named folders (sharing the same hierarchy level as "inbox"), and many of these folders have their own sub-folders.

I have setup dozens of message filters to handle the various addresses, senders, subjects, etc. Most are used to simply direct mail to a certain folder.

I created a new filter today, for a messages that end up in a particular sub-folder. The triggers were two subject based filters, set to mark these messages as read. A separate filter is set to send these messages into the aforementioned sub-folder. When I added the new "mark as read" filter today, and ran the filter, every message in the sub-folder disappeared. They are not in the trash, not in the junk folder, they are just gone. I checked every folder I have, and can't find the missing messages. The sub-folder in question shows 0 messages in the properties. Repairing it made no difference either. There was no "undo" to be done. I eventually restarted TB, with no resolution. This is repeatable and certainly filter related. I waited until new messages cam in to this folder, and tried the filter again manually. It should have triggered automatically, but it did not. When I triggered it manually, the new messages also disappeared.

Please tell me how to prevent this from happening in the future. I can afford to lose what is already gone, but would like to resolve the cause in case it happens to a more critical folder.

Thank You! Jeff
creator: lobudgt
